remarks: Recover the base scalar from a scalar polynomial.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
statement:
ply1scl.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
ply1scl.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` P ) $.

ply1sclid $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ X e. K ) -> X = ( ( coe1 ` ( A ` X ) ) ` 0 ) ) $.
